query:
SELECT p.id, p.name, COUNT(a.id) as assetCount 
FROM projects p 
INNER JOIN assets a ON a.projectId = p.id 
GROUP BY p.id 
HAVING assetCount > 0 
ORDER BY assetCount DESC 
LIMIT 5;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2g8chP3aro94bni.root --database XnmtZZwX6e46H8JVZbq4Ta --execute SELECT p.id, p.name, COUNT(a.id) as assetCount

INNER JOIN assets a ON a.projectId = p.id
